name: mongodb-core
description: Core MongoDB driver functionality, no bells and whistles and meant for integration not end applications

scripts.coverage: nyc node test/runner.js -t functional -l && node_modules/.bin/nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | node_modules/.bin/coveralls
